General.Name: Al-Jouf Agriculture Development Co
General.Description: Al-Jouf Agricultural Development Co. engages in production, sale, and marketing of agricultural products in Saudi Arabia. The company offers potatoes and sweet potatoes, dates, olive oils, and honey. It also engages in palm and olive agriculture, as well as beekeeping activities. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Sakakah, Saudi Arabia.
